name: Maki99999s Game Collection
description:
Three of my first games.

I'll never make a game again (at least not alone).

False Truth (german only):
I tried to make a horror game, but i had no assets, had performance problems and my code was spaghetti.

RollBall 3:
A game where you are rolling with a ball. It's a reboot of my first Unity-Project ever.

TicTacToe:
I wanted to fill the game list with a few simple games, but i had no motivation and even a singleplayer-mode for TicTacToe was more difficult than i thought.
